emptyState.title: No crypto assets yet?
emptyState.desc: Make sure the <1><0>{{managerAppName}}</0></1> app is installed and start receiving

banners.promoteMobile: Enjoy the Ledger Live experience, now available on mobile with the {{productName}}

dashboard.title: Portfolio

emptyAccountTile.desc: Add accounts to manage more crypto assets

dashboard.summary: Here's the summary of your account
dashboard.summary_plural: Here's the summary of your {{count}} accounts

currentAddress.title: Current address
currentAddress.messageIfUnverified: Please verify that the {{currencyName}} address shown in Ledger Live matches the one on your Ledger device
currentAddress.messageIfAccepted: Address confirmed, please re-verify it if you copy/paste or scan the QR code.
currentAddress.messageIfSkipped: Your {{currencyName}} address has not been confirmed on your Ledger device. Please verify it for optimal security.

deviceConnect.dashboard: Navigate to the <1>Dashboard</1> on your device
deviceConnect.step2: Navigate to the <1><0>{{managerAppName}}</0></1> app on your device

sidebar.text: Click this button to add accounts to the Portfolio

dashboard.title: Install apps or add accounts
dashboard.desc: Open the Manager to install apps or add accounts if your Ledger device already has apps installed

partners.title: Buy crypto
partners.desc: Try a few services we've selected
partners.btcdirect: Buy and sell with the greatest of ease at Europe's leading cryptocurrency broker. Sign up for free and receive your coins within minutes! Our users rate us with an 8,7 on Trustpilot
partners.changelly: Changelly is a popular instant crypto asset exchange with 100+ coins and tokens listed.
partners.changenow: ChangeNOW is one of the leading custody-free instant exchange services
partners.coinberry: Coinberry is the most trusted crypto platform in Canada with better-than-bank security, best-in-class user interface and No Fee funding & withdraw. Pre-register to get early access to our platform if you are not a Canadian citizen.
partners.coinhouse: Coinhouse is a trusted platform for individuals and institutional investors looking to analyze, acquire, sell and securely store crypto assets.
partners.coinmama: Coinmama is a financial service that makes it fast, safe and fun to buy digital assets, anywhere in the world.
partners.genesis: Genesis is an institutional trading firm offering liquidity and borrow for digital currencies, including bitcoin, bitcoin cash, ethereum, ethereum classic, litecoin, and XRP.
partners.kyberswap: Fast, simple and secure token swap platform. Powered by Kyber Network's on-chain liquidity protocol.
partners.luno: Luno makes it safe and easy to buy, store and learn about cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum
partners.paybis: it is safe and easy to Buy Bitcoin with credit card from PayBis. Service operates in US, Canada, Germany, Russia and Saudi Arabia.
partners.shapeshift: ShapeShift is an online marketplace where users can buy and sell digital assets. It is a fast and secure way for the world to buy and sell digital assets, with no lengthy signup process, no counterparty risk, and no friction.
partners.simplex: Simplex is a EU licensed financial institution, providing a fraudless credit card payment solution.
partners.taxtoken: Automated cryptocurrency tax and cost basis software for US citizens.
partners.thorswap: ThorSwap is an instant, safe and fair crypto asset market powered by decentralized atomic swap technologies. It is the most convenient way to start trading, no registration or KYC for small amount transactions.
partners.bitpanda: Bitpanda is Europe’s leading retail broker for buying and selling Bitcoin, Ethereum, IOTA and many more. Deposit money using your credit card, SOFORT-Transfer, NETELLER, and other options.
partners.exmo: Founded in 2013 and based in London, Kiev, Barcelona, and Moscow, EXMO is #1 exchange in Eastern Europe, and one of the world's largest global exchanges in volume and liquidity.

addAccounts.title: Add accounts

connectDevice.desc: Follow the steps below to add <1><0>{{currencyName}}</0></1> accounts

addAccounts.successDescription: Add more accounts or return to Portfolio
addAccounts.successDescription_plural: Add more accounts or return to Portfolio

createNewAccount.title: Add new account
createNewAccount.noOperationOnLastAccount: Can't add a new account before you've received on your <1><0>{{accountName}}</0></1> account
createNewAccount.noAccountToCreate: No <1><0>{{currencyName}}</0></1> account was found to create

apps.help: Check on your device to see which apps are already installed

firmware.disclaimerTitle: You are about to install <1><0>firmware version {{version}}</0></1>.
firmware.disclaimerAppDelete: Uninstall all apps from your device. This does not affect your crypto assets.
firmware.disclaimerAppReinstall: Ensure your Recovery sheet is accessible, as a precaution.
firmware.downloadingUpdateDesc: Please wait while the update installer is being downloaded

modal.confirmIdentifierText: Verify that the identifier on your device is the same as the identifier below. Press the right button and enter your PIN code to confirm.
modal.mcuFirst: Disconnect the USB cable from your device
modal.mcuSecond: Press the left button and hold it while you reconnect the USB cable until the <1><0>{{repairProcessing}}</0></1> screen appears
modal.mcuPin: Please be patient while the update is finalized
modal.successText: Please re-install the apps on your device

manager.title: Manager
manager.subtitle: Install or uninstall apps on your device

device.title: Connect your device
device.desc: Follow the steps below to open the Manager

confirmAddress.title: Verification
confirmAddress.text: Please verify that the {{currencyName}} address to be shown in Ledger Live matches the one on your Ledger device

highFeeModal.title: High fees
highFeeModal.desc: Be careful, the transaction fees (<1><0>{{fees}}</0></1>) represent more than 10% of the amount (<3><0>{{amount}}</0></3>). Do you want to continue?

verification.title: Verification
verification.warning: Please verify all transaction details on your device
verification.body: Confirm the transaction on your device to send it

confirmation.title: Confirmation

success.title: Transaction sent
success.text: Your account balance will update once the blockchain has confirmed the transaction

confirmation.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please check back in a few minutes to make sure your transaction did not go through before trying again.

accounts.title: Export accounts
accounts.desc: Add your accounts in Ledger Live mobile. Your accounts will only synchronize with the blockchain, not between your mobile and desktop apps.

operations.title: Operation history
operations.desc: Save a CSV file of your account operations on your computer.

modal.title: Scan to export to mobile
modal.listTitle: On the Ledger Live mobile app:
modal.step3: Scan the <1><0>LiveQR code</0></1> until the loader hits 100%

display.languageDesc: Set the language displayed in Ledger Live.
display.counterValueDesc: Choose the currency shown next to your balance and operations.
display.exchangeDesc: Provides the exchange rate from Bitcoin to {{fiat}}, used to estimate the value of your crypto assets (crypto asset → BTC → {{fiat}}).
display.regionDesc: Choose your region, used to set Ledger Live's time zone.
display.stockDesc: Choose Western to display an increase in market value in blue or Eastern to display it in red.

currencies.desc: Select a crypto asset to edit its settings.
currencies.exchangeDesc: Choose the provider of the exchange rate from {{currencyName}} to Bitcoin, used to estimate the value of your crypto assets ({{ticker}} → BTC → {{fiat}}).
currencies.confirmationsNbDesc: Set the number of network confirmations for a transaction to be marked as confirmed.

profile.passwordDesc: Set a password to prevent unauthorized access to Ledger Live data stored on your computer, including account names, balances, transactions and public addresses.
profile.passwordAutoLockDesc: Automatically lock Ledger Live after inactivity.
profile.softResetDesc: Clear the Ledger Live cache to force resynchronization with the blockchain.
profile.hardResetDesc: Erase all Ledger Live data stored on your computer, including your accounts, transaction history and settings.
profile.developerModeDesc: Show developer and testnet apps in the Manager.
profile.analyticsDesc: Enable analytics to help Ledger understand how to improve user experience. This includes clicks, page visits, redirections, actions (send, receive, lock, etc.), end of page scrolls, (un)installing and version of apps, app version, number of accounts, crypto assets and operations, session durations, Ledger device type and firmware.
profile.reportErrorsDesc: Automatically send reports to help Ledger fix bugs.
profile.launchOnboardingDesc: Set up as new or restore a Ledger device. Accounts and settings are kept.

about.desc: App information, Terms and Conditions, and Privacy Policy.

help.desc: Learn more about Ledger Live or get help.
help.faqDesc: A problem? Get help using Ledger Live with your hardware wallet.
help.termsDesc: By using Ledger Live you are deemed to have accepted our Terms of Use.
help.privacyDesc: Refer to our Privacy Policy to learn what personal data we collect, why and how we use it.

experimental.desc: Try out experimental features and let us know what you think
experimental.disclaimer: These are experimental features we provide on an “as is” basis for our community to test. They may change, break or be removed at any time. By enabling them, you agree to use them at your own risk. Your crypto assets remain secured by your Ledger hardware wallet.

hardResetModal.title: Reset Ledger Live
hardResetModal.desc: Erase all Ledger Live data stored on your computer, including your accounts, transaction history and settings? The private keys providing access to your crypto assets remain secure on your Ledger device and Recovery sheet.

softResetModal.title: Clear cache
softResetModal.desc: Clearing the cache forces network resynchronization. Your settings and accounts are preserved. The private keys providing access to your crypto assets remain secure on your Ledger device and Recovery sheet.

resetFallbackModal.title: User action required
resetFallbackModal.part1: Could not delete cache folder. Please delete the folder manually:
resetFallbackModal.part2: Click the Open folder button, the
resetFallbackModal.part5: Then you can restart the app normally.

removeAccountModal.title: Remove account
removeAccountModal.desc: This will not affect your crypto assets. Accounts can always be re-added.

openUserDataDirectory.title: View user data
openUserDataDirectory.desc: View the user data that is stored on your computer, including your accounts, caches and settings.

repairDevice.title: Repair your Ledger device
repairDevice.descSettings: Use this tool to restore your Ledger device if it has become stuck during a firmware update.
repairDevice.desc: Please select the state of your Ledger device.

exportLogs.title: Save logs
exportLogs.desc: Saving Ledger Live logs may be necessary for troubleshooting purposes.

setPassword.title: Password lock
setPassword.subTitle: Set a password
setPassword.desc: Make sure to remember your password. Losing your password requires resetting Ledger Live and re-adding accounts.

disablePassword.title: Disable password lock
disablePassword.desc: Ledger Live data will be stored unencrypted on your computer. This includes account names, transactions and public addresses.

update.error: Error during update. Please download again

crash.uselessText: You may try again by restarting Ledger Live. Please export your logs and contact Ledger Support if the problem persists.

disclaimerModal.title: Trade safely
disclaimerModal.desc_1: Before sending and receiving crypto assets, educate yourself to make informed decisions. Crypto assets are volatile and the prices can go up and down. Carefully evaluate your trading goals and the financial risk you are willing to take.
disclaimerModal.desc_2: Please beware that Ledger does not provide financial, tax, or legal advice. You should take such decisions on your own or consult with reliable experts.

exportOperationsModal.title: Operation history
exportOperationsModal.desc: Select the accounts for which to save the operation history
exportOperationsModal.descSuccess: A CSV file of your operation history has been successfully saved in the selected folder

init.title: Get started with your Ledger device

selectDevice.title: Select your device
selectDevice.usbOnlyTooltip: Ledger Live desktop currently does not support Bluetooth

disclaimer.note1: Always choose your own PIN code.
disclaimer.note3: Never use a device supplied with a PIN code or a recovery phrase.

nano.step1: Connect the {{productName}} to your computer. Press both buttons to begin.
nano.step2: Press the right button to select <1><0>{{configureAsNewDevice}}?</0></1>.
nano.step3: Press the left or right button to select a digit. Press both buttons to validate.
nano.step4: Select ✓ to confirm your PIN code. Select ⬅ to erase a digit.

nanoX.step3: Press the left or right button to select a digit.
nanoX.step4: Select ✓ to confirm your PIN code. Select ⬅ to erase a digit.

blue.step3: Choose a PIN code of 4 to 8 digits.

nano.step1: Connect the {{productName}} to your computer. Press both buttons to begin.
nano.step2: Press the left button to cancel <1><0>{{configureAsNewDevice}}?</0></1>. Then press the right button to select <3><0>{{restoreConfiguration}}?</0></3>.
nano.step3: Press the left or right button to select a digit. Press both buttons to validate.
nano.step4: Select ✓ to confirm your PIN code. Select ⬅ to erase a digit.

nanoX.step2: Press both buttons as instructed on your {{productName}} screen.
nanoX.step3: Press the left button to cancel <1><0>{{setUpAsNewDevice}}</0></1>.
nanoX.step4: Press the right button to select <1><0>{{restoreConfiguration}}</0></1>.
nanoX.step5: Choose a PIN code between 4 and 8 digits long.

blue.step3: Choose a PIN code of 4 to 8 digits.

initialize.title: Save your recovery phrase
initialize.desc: Your device will display a 24-word recovery phrase to back up your private keys

nano.step1: Write <1><0>{{seedWord1}}</0></1> in position 1 on a blank Recovery sheet.
nano.step2: Press the right button to continue and write down all 24 words.
nano.step3: Confirm your recovery phrase: select and validate each word by pressing both buttons.

blue.step1: Write down each word on a blank Recovery sheet while keeping the order.
blue.step2: Tap <1><0>{{seedNext}}</0></1> and write down all words until the <3><0>{{seedConfirmation}}</0></3> screen appears.
blue.step3: Enter each word to confirm your recovery phrase.

restore.title: Enter your recovery phrase
restore.desc: Enter the recovery phrase saved on your Recovery sheet

nano.step1: Choose the length of your recovery phrase.
nano.step2: Enter the first letters of <1><0>{{seedWord1}}</0></1> until suggested words appear.
nano.step3: Choose <1><0>{{seedWord1}}</0></1> from the suggested words by pressing both buttons.
nano.step4: Repeat the process until the last word.

blue.step1: Select the length of your recovery phrase.
blue.step2: Type the first word of your recovery phrase. Tap the word when it appears.
blue.step3: Repeat the process until the last word.

disclaimer.note1: Carefully secure your 24-word recovery phrase out of sight.
disclaimer.note2: Make sure you are the sole holder of your recovery phrase.
disclaimer.note3: Ledger does not keep any backup of your recovery phrase.
disclaimer.note4: Never use a device supplied with a PIN code or a recovery phrase.

genuineCheck.title: Security checklist
genuineCheck.descGeneric: Before continuing, please complete the security checklist

step1.title: Did you choose your PIN code by yourself?

step2.title: Did you save your recovery phrase by yourself?

title.pinFailed: Didn't choose your own PIN code?
title.recoveryPhraseFailed: Didn't save your recovery phrase by yourself?
title.isGenuineFail: Oops, your device does not seem genuine...

desc.pinFailed: Never use a device supplied with a PIN code. Please contact us when in doubt.
desc.recoveryPhraseFailed: Only save a recovery phrase that was displayed on your device and to you alone. Please contact us when in doubt.
desc.isGenuineFail: Your device did not pass the authenticity test required to connect to Ledger’s secure server. Please contact Ledger Support to get assistance.

setPassword.title: Password lock (optional)
setPassword.desc: Set a password to prevent unauthorized access to Ledger Live data on your computer, including account names, transactions and public addresses

disclaimer.note1: Make sure to remember your password. Do not share it.
disclaimer.note2: Losing your password requires resetting Ledger Live and re-adding accounts.
disclaimer.note3: Resetting Ledger Live does not affect your crypto assets.

analytics.title: Bugs and analytics
analytics.desc: Share anonymized data to help improve Ledger security products and services

shareAnalytics.title: Analytics
shareAnalytics.desc: Enable analytics to help Ledger understand how to improve user experience.

mandatoryContextual.item7: Number of accounts, crypto assets and operations

sentryLogs.title: Bug reports
sentryLogs.desc: Automatically send reports to help Ledger fix bugs.

technicalData.title: Technical data*
technicalData.desc: Ledger will automatically collect fully anonymized technical data to help improve user experience.

mandatoryContextual.title: Technical data
mandatoryContextual.item2: Ledger Live version, language and region

terms.title: Terms *
terms.desc: By continuing, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to the <1>Terms of Use</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3>.

finish.title: Your device is ready!
finish.desc: Install some apps on your device and access the Portfolio

generic.title: {{message}}
generic.description: Something went wrong. Please retry or contact us.

BtcUnmatchedApp.title: That's the wrong app
BtcUnmatchedApp.description: Open the ‘{{managerAppName}}’ app on your device

DeviceInOSUExpected.title: Sorry, update failed
DeviceInOSUExpected.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support

DeviceHalted.title: Please restart your Ledger device and retry
DeviceHalted.description: An unexpected error occurred, so please try again

DisconnectedDeviceDuringOperation.title: Oops, device disconnected
DisconnectedDeviceDuringOperation.description: The connection to the device was lost during an operation, please try again

FirmwareOrAppUpdateRequired.title: Firmware or app update required
FirmwareOrAppUpdateRequired.description: Please use the Manager to uninstall all apps and check if a firmware update is available before reinstalling them

HardResetFail.title: Oops, could not reset
HardResetFail.description: Please try again or contact us when in doubt

LatestMCUInstalledError.title: Oops, nothing to update
LatestMCUInstalledError.description: Needlessly tried to update the device microcontroller. Please contact Ledger Support if there's a problem with your device.

LedgerAPI4xx.description: Please check your connection and try again or contact Ledger Support.

LedgerAPI5xx.title: Sorry, try again.
LedgerAPI5xx.description: The server could not handle your request. Please try again at a later moment or contact Ledger Support. {{message}}

LedgerAPINotAvailable.title: Sorry, {{currencyName}} services unavailable
LedgerAPINotAvailable.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support

ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.title: Oops, that's already installed
ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.description: Check your device to see which apps are already installed

ManagerAppRelyOnBTC.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum apps required
ManagerAppRelyOnBTC.description: Install the latest Bitcoin and Ethereum apps first

ManagerDeviceLocked.title: Please unlock your device
ManagerDeviceLocked.description: Your device was locked, please unlock it

ManagerNotEnoughSpace.title: Sorry, not enough storage left
ManagerNotEnoughSpace.description: Uninstall some apps to make space. This will not affect your crypto assets.

ManagerUninstallBTCDep.title: Sorry, this app is required
ManagerUninstallBTCDep.description: Uninstall the Bitcoin or Ethereum app last

NoAddressesFound.title: Sorry, no accounts found
NoAddressesFound.description: Something went wrong with address calculation, try again or contact Ledger Support

NotEnoughBalance.title: Oops, insufficient balance
NotEnoughBalance.description: Make sure the account to debit has sufficient balance

NotEnoughBalanceBecauseDestinationNotCre.title: Recipient address is inactive. Send at least {{minimalAmount}} to activate it

PasswordIncorrect.title: The password you entered is incorrect

TimeoutError.title: Oops, a time out occurred
TimeoutError.description: It took too long for the server to respond, please retry

TimeoutTagged.title: Oops, a time out occurred ({{tag}})
TimeoutTagged.description: It took too long for the server to respond

TransportError.title: Something went wrong, please reconnect your device

TransportStatusError.title: Something went wrong, please reconnect your device

DeviceShouldStayInApp.title: Please open the {{appName}} app
DeviceShouldStayInApp.description: Keep the {{appName}} app open while we look for your accounts

UnexpectedBootloader.title: Oops, your device should not be in Bootloader mode
UnexpectedBootloader.description: Please restart your device or contact us

UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.title: Update canceled
UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support

UserRefusedOnDevice.title: Transaction refused on device
UserRefusedOnDevice.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support in case of doubt

UserRefusedAddress.title: Receive address rejected
UserRefusedAddress.description: Please try again or contact Ledger Support when in doubt

UpdateYourApp.title: App update required
UpdateYourApp.description: Uninstall and reinstall the {{managerAppName}} app in the Manager

DeviceOnDashboardExpected.title: Return to Dashboard
DeviceOnDashboardExpected.description: Please navigate back to Dashboard on your device

WrongDeviceForAccount.title: Wrong device or passphrase for ‘{{accountName}}’
WrongDeviceForAccount.description: Please use the device or passphrase for the selected account

DeviceAppVerifyNotSupported.title: App update required
DeviceAppVerifyNotSupported.description: Uninstall and reinstall the {{managerAppName}} app in the Manager

InvalidAddress.title: This is not a valid {{currencyName}} address

InvalidAddressBecauseDestinationIsAlsoSo.title: Recipient address is the same as the sender address

CantOpenDevice.title: Oops, couldn’t connect to device
CantOpenDevice.description: Device detected but connection failed. Please try again or contact us if the problem persists.

ETHAddressNonEIP.title: Auto-verification not available: carefully verify the address

CantScanQRCode.title: Couldn't scan this QR code: auto-verification not supported by this address

FeeNotLoaded.title: Couldn’t load fee rates, please set manual fees
